snippet.title: 【Tokyo Game Show】New games exclusively for Apple Watch! Let's play and get healthy!
snippet.description:
★★Exhibit at TGS "Selected Indie 80" in Hall 10 A70!★★
This is a visual novel application that can be played on the Apple Watch.
In addition to the traditional elements of adventure games with choices, the “Read Walk System” features a scenario that adapts to the “distance walked” and “physical fitness” of the player in real life. It offers a new experience that combines “health”, “game” and “reading”.
In the game, the story unfolds as the player sends instructions from a communication terminal in order to save his girlfriend who has been kidnapped by someone. The key to solving the case depends on the “choice” of what kind of instructions to send and the player’s own “activity” tracked by Apple Watch.
Enjoy a next-generation “reading experience” that is both entertaining and health-enhancing!

Title:BOOSTED
Genre:Visual Novel for Health
Compatible model: Apple Watch only
Languages supported: Japanese / English
Release: Scheduled for 2023
Official website：https://oshinovel.com/boosted/boosted
X（Twitter）：https://twitter.com/o4novel

#oshinovel
#boosted
#AppleWatch
